content:
# The inventory check did not return any specific results, which suggests I may not have the necessary materials to craft a stone furnace.
# To craft a stone furnace, I need:
# - 5 stone

# Since I have already harvested 10 stones earlier, I should be able to craft the stone furnace if I can access the crafting interface.

# I will now attempt to craft a stone furnace using the stones in my inventory.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Attempt to craft a single stone furnace using the stones I have.
